Member Function Documentation

int64_t gaia::core::PackageStats::getCacheSize ( ) const

Get size of cache used by the application.

(e.g., /data/data/<app>/cache)

int64_t gaia::core::PackageStats::getCodeSize ( ) const

Get size of the code (e.g., APK, PKG)

int64_t gaia::core::PackageStats::getDataSize ( ) const

Get size of the internal data size for the application.

(e.g., /data/data/<app>)

int64_t gaia::core::PackageStats::getExternalCacheSize ( ) const

Get size of the external cache used by the application (i.e., on the SD card).

If this is a subdirectory of the data directory, this size will be subtracted out of the external data size.

int64_t gaia::core::PackageStats::getExternalCodeSize ( ) const

Get size of the secure container on external storage holding the application's code.
